They sat the bewildered boy down, his towel sliding from his shoulders and leaving him in nearly his birthday suit, his belly jiggling with motion as the twins inside him stretched. After several long minutes of mental recovery, Steven of course demanded an explanation for what exactly was going on. Shawn started at the beginning with his story as Billy waddled off to get snacks to calm the rumbling in everyone's bellies.

After the story (and a cheesecake burger), Steven rubbed his belly gently. "Wishes coming true, huh? Well, I can't really explain how else four boys-" "Five," Billy chimed in, remembering the other boy and his sister from the pool the other day. "...FIVE boys, suddenly became pregnant out of nowhere. I'm sure we've all been taught by now that girls are the ones that have babies." He looked down to the belly spilling out into his lap, holding for a few moments in silence before snapping back up to Shawn. "I want a wish. And I think it's going to be a big one."

Shawn nodded. "Anything, just ask away."

Steven then said, "I wish that both boys and girls getting pregnant was normal, that no one questioned it, and that it was okay for little boys and girls to be pregnant too."

Shawn was taken aback for a moment, before chuckling. How hadn't he thought of such a practical, genius wish himself? After making it so, with his eyes glowing a bright hot pink, he turned to Steven again. "Anything else I can do?"

The doorknob Gasped for air and then replied, "I said a little of that went a long way. AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" Alice glared at the doorknob and said, "Very funny I've got a joke for you too it's on the bottom of my heel here let me show you."
"OK, OK, Point taken no more size jokes" The doorknob said, "All you need to do is Get the key and dink whats left in the bottle and you'll be free of this place. Alice felt around trying to find the key it was tricky due to the fact that she couldn't turn her head to look. Eventually she did find the key and bottle Gabbing both in one hand She brought the bottle close to her mouth and drained the bottle of the rest of its contents. Soon the falling sensation returned as Alice Began to shrink once more. Alice healed on tightly to the Key was The floor rushed to meet her. Soon Alice was back to being only 12 inches tall her belly and breasts on the other hand had grown out to 12 babies and a plump P cup bust. Alice Slowly stood Up With the key, her dress now hanging off her belly and showing a lot of cleavage. she when to the doorknob and shoved the key into its moth, "What nothing to say?" 1432222122.content:
Alice pushed the blue door open and found herself in the middle of a large ballroom everyone staring at her. "Hello." He said nervously before she found herself being dragged along to a woman in a long flowing dress.
"Ah...good to see you Alice. Welcome. Are you here to fulfill your duty to me?"
"What duty? I do not understand."
"I find myself unable to bare a child and need you to do it for me." The woman said gesturing around. "My kingdom needs an heir and it must be born of someone not from this place. Please. Have a child." Alice swallowed a little before slowly nodding.
"Okay." She said simply as a small table with a pale blue vial appeared in front of her.
"Drink this and you will become pregnant so that you may bear us a heir to the throne." Alice nodded and quickly drank the potion.

14322221221.content:
“What is the meaning of this, she should be as big as a house by now.” Alice was a little perplexed by what this lady meant by that, and her sudden change in demeanor made her feel worried.

An ant the size of a child, who wore a military uniform and walked like man, coughed awkwardly and stammered. “Your highness we didn’t have any of th…the potion ready.

The woman slowly turned scowling at the ant. “AND WHY NOT! Guards cut him in half.” Alice gasped as the ant dropped to its “knees” and pleaded for mercy, as two other ants dragged him off, Alice was appalled and cried out. “That is awful, you can’t do that.” The woman swirled around still irritated and turned her fury toward Alice. “Oh, but I can, I am the Queen of bellies, and I can do whatever I want.” Alice looked the manic woman over seeing her regal pale green dress, and crown, and taking special note of her skinny gaunt appearance. “Queen of bellies, that title I would assume is ironic.” Alice scoffed, angering the Queen more. “I am indeed, I rule the bellies of all in this kingdom, and I claim yours.” Alice was shocked, and feared what this mad woman had planned for her. “What do mean to do to me?” Alice asked, fearful of the answer, the Queen smiled smugly as she put her hand on Alice’s flat belly. “I told you foolish girl, you shall birth me heirs, hundreds of them, your stomach shall be like a mountain.” Alice blushed slightly at the absurd idea, but it was quickly replaced by dread as she realized this woman was totally mad.

“I will let you do no such thing!” Alice shouted, The Queen turned away from Alice and let out a loud “Ha.” As she sauntered away. “As if you wouldn’t love it.” Said the Queen as she turned to face Alice again, who crossed her arms and pouted. “Besides, you foolish girl, you don’t have a choice. Guards take her to the dungeon until the potion is ready.” Several more of the ant guards moved from the corners of the ballroom and skittered towards Alice. She turned quickly and ran down a hallway. “Stop her, don’t let her escape.” The queen cried, the ant guards hot on Alice’s trail.

143222212211.content:
Alice turned down another hall, and ducked into a room, grabbing a nearby chair, and blocking the door. The ants bang on the door, and Alice looked around for a means to escape. She noticed a small door, one big enough that she could crawl through. “Cmon, Mum don’t make this difficult.” An ant cried from the other side of the door. Alice seeing no other option went through the door, and crawled into the dark, small tunnel. It went on for a while, Alice couldn’t see a thing. “Oh my, how long is this bloody corridor, it’s so dark I can’t even see where I’m goingIINNG.” Alice’s griping was cut short as she stumbled, the tunnel suddenly becoming a steep slope. Alice tumbled down and down, head over heels.

Alice lands roughly on her back with a grunt, her head was spinning from all the tumbling and her limbs were scratched and sore. She stood back up, brushing her dress off, when she heard a sultry woman’s voice. “That looked like it hurt.” She looked around to find a large grinning rabbit, watching her. “Oh, yes it very much does.” Alice said rubbing her tender rear. “Are you lost?” The grinning rabbit asks, Alice now fixing her hair replies. “In a way, but at least I’m not in a place, I don’t want to be.” Alice says looking back at the hole, thinking of the Queen. “You wouldn’t happen to know how I can get out of here, do you?” Alice asks looking to the large rabbit. “Such manners, I don’t even know who you are.” Alice pouted feeling a little embarrassed. “Well, I don’t know who you are.” The rabbit bounded in front of her catching her by surprise. “It is customary to introduce yourself first, but since you asked, you may call me the Cheshire Rabbit, and you?” As it said this it hopped out of view, disappearing from Alice’s sight, Alice searched for the rabbit as she answered. “My name is Alice… Alice Biggle, pleased to meet you.”

“Hello Ms. Alice.” Alice turned toward the voice finding the rabbit leaning on the far wall. “As to your question that is more complicated, If you mean a way out of the area, then yes just follow the path before you and you shall eventually be clear of this forest.” The Cheshire Rabbit bounded into the air, and Alice watched as she landed in front of a path in the trees, one Alice feels wasn’t there before. “However, if you mean, how do you return home, that is something you must find on your own.” Alice frowned, disappointed with that answer. “Well that isn’t very helpful.” The Cheshire rabbit just smiled, before responding. “Nonsense, I answered your question, however Alice I will warn you, be on your guard, the Queen is not the only one that would gladly make your belly bigger, if you’re not careful you could return home bigger than you house, unless you’re into that sort of thing.” The Cheshire Rabbit winked at that last part, and hopped up disappearing into a hole that appeared in the ground, which disappeared in the blink of the eye. Alice was left blushing at the insinuation. “The nerve of that rabbit, why would I want a big belly.”

1432222122111.content:
Alice followed along the path feeling a little weirded out, the vegetation around the area was vibrantly colored and all of it had huge bulbous spheres projecting from them, jiggling like water balloons. Alice couldn’t help but feel, like she was surrounded by swollen breasts and pregnant bellies. To a girl like her, it all seemed uncomfortably erotic. Alice didn’t want to admit it, but she did have a desire for a big full belly, curious as to what it would feel like. Often times pretending when she is alone in her room, stuffing things under her dress, and imagining the sensation. Now as she followed the trail, it was like her secret fetish was being shoved right in her face, and it was weird.

Suddenly she heard rustling in the brush, something was moving, Alice began to panic remembering the rabbit’s warning. “You there come out, I know you’re sneaking about, its rude you know.” Alice was stiff as a board, her shoulders were tense, and her arms to her side, she might appear angry if her fearful expression wasn’t giving her away. The thing emerged from the bushes and was not what she expected.

It was a tiny little berry no bigger than a strawberry, with the features of a man. Little vine like arms and legs, and a face with seed like eyes, and a tiny mouth. “Oh goodness me, another visitor it has been so long.” The little berry said sounding desperately relieved. “This is so wonderful, it has been ages since anyone has visited this place, I’d feared we would never meet another.” The berry exclaimed, collapsing to its knees and prostrating itself in gratitude. Alice sighed, relieved that the one stalking her was just the tiny silly berry. “Oh, hello there who are you.” Alice asked with a warm smile. “I’m a bloe berry mam.” It said standing back up and wiping a tear of juice from its eye. “What brings you here small giant, are you lost.” The berry asked, Alice noted a creepiness in his smile when he asked, but that could just be his face. “Yes, actually I’m trying to get out of these woods you see.” Alice explained feeling something was off. “Oh great, I know the way, I can show it to you, and when I do you can do something for me.” The little berry said matter of factually, as if it had done this before, the berry beckoned her to follow as it headed off the trail. “I don’t know, I feel like, I would rather stay on the path.” Alice said sensing something was weird, the berry noticing her reservations was really confused. “What’s wrong, you’re not scared of a little berry?” Alice was annoyed at its point. It was right she could easily squash it if the berry tried anything. “Fine but this had better not be a waste of my time.” Alice said following it into the brush.

The berry climbed up onto Alice shoulder and pointed the way. “So, small giant what’s your name?” The berry said sitting on her shoulder. “Oh my, yes, I do seem to forget that, my name is Alice, do you have a name?” Alice asked looking at it. “Bloe berries don’t have names really, were not important.” The berry said, suddenly seeming much less chipper. “Oh, I’m sorry.” Alice said, realizing she might have depressed the little berry. “So what is a bloe berry, might I ask?” The berry snapped out of its funk, as it noticed her question. “Well you see, bloe berry are too tiny to be of any importance, what we really want is to be bigger, but were not pumpkinds or wotermelen so we can’t get big.” Alice didn’t quite get what he was talking about, but understood it enough. “Well, I assure you everyone has an importance, even a bloe berry.” Alice said trying to make it feel better, the berry seemed perplexed by her comment, but then understood. “Oh no, bloe berries have an importance, we can’t be big, but we can make others big.” The berry said with a confident smile. “We live on in their bigness.” Alice stared at the silly berry, in confused amusement. “Ookay.” Alice said, humoring her little companion, as they continued their trek out of the forest.

After half an hour of walking Alice was getting very irritated. “How much farther to this exit.” Alice asked glancing at the berry riding on her shoulder. “It's that way, just keep going.” The berry said disinterested, as it was lying down, chilling on Alice’s shoulder. The fact the berry was lounging on her while she had to trek, particularly annoyed her. “Miserable little free loader.” She grumbled, quietly. “You say something Alice?” It asked oblivious or brazenly ignoring her gripes. “Wait a minute we’re here.” The berry exclaimed, jumping to attention, it pointed at a thicket, and Alice forced her way through.

Alice and the berry entered into a small clearing, like a little room, and on the other side of the clearing was a small hole in some brambles, which shone from the sunlight outside. “Oh, thank goodness, I was afraid you were leading me on some wild goose chase, and if you had, I would’ve been forced to squash you.” Alice explained giving the berry an annoyed look. “Hey, I’m no fibber berry” It said with a nervous chuckle, feeling intimidated by the girl. “Hey guys, we have a visitor.” The berry cried, surprising Alice, and suddenly from the brush around the clearing, bushels of little bloe berries emerged to greet them. That unease Alice sensed before returned, as the swarm of berries gathered around and started murmuring and leering at her. “Oh, hello everyone, I didn’t know you had friends.” Alice said nervously, her berry companion raised his arms, silencing the murmuring berry horde. “Fellow bloe berries, this is our hero Alice, she has promised to help me, and just maybe she will help you.” Alice stared at the berry in disbelief, as she internally screamed, wondering what the berry was volunteering her for. The berry turned to look her in the eyes, juicy tears streaming down its face, its expression one of yearning joy, and asked. “Oh please Ms. Alice, eat me, let me help you become a big giant.”

Alice was shocked and confused, stealing a glance at the other anticipating berries. “I’m sorry, but I would do no such thing, I could never eat someone, especially someone who is so friendly.” Alice said with a smile hoping it would understand, the little bloe berry’s expression changed from joy to furious disgust, it was obviously offended by her answer. “We had a deal, are you crazy, you don’t want to be bigger, you think being small is okay, you silly child.” Alice was flabbergasted by the strange outburst from the suicidal little berry. She picked it up off her shoulder and flicked it away. “Look I don’t know what you’re playing at, but I won’t eat talking berries, and I believe I need to be going.” The berries started shouting getting whipped into a frenzy, and started blocking her path. “Don’t let her get away.” Yelled the once friendly bloe berry, they grabbed at her dress, climbed up her legs, and dropped down on her from the overhanging leaves. Alice batted the berries away, unaware as the first berry she met was loading into a slingshot like contraption. “Where do you think you’re going you silly child.” Shouted the berry hoping to get her attention. Alice getting really angry turned to face the berry and shouted over the angry mob. “Now see here you little…”

She was cut off as the bloe berry was launched slinging right into her mouth. Everyone stopped as Alice tried to push the berry out with her tongue, but the berry dived down her throat. Alice looked down as the berries listened, they heard the cheerful yahoo of the berry as he slid down into her stomach. There was a loud pop accompanied by the sensation of a harmless explosion in Alice’s belly, followed with the berries cheering, and Alice belched up a colorful cloud, and croaked out. “What was that?” Alice said, she put her hands on her stomach and was shocked at what she felt. She pressed down her dress to find her belly looked bloated, like she had eaten a large meal. “Blow her up” shouted the berries, as Alice quickly ran toward the hole in the brambles. The berries at her feet tripped her, and as she got back up, some berries above jump down and grabbed onto her hair, forcing her to lean back. As she yelped from the sudden shift, a berry swung into her mouth with a vine. She shook off the berries from her back, as the one in her mouth dropped down her throat.

Alice stumbled forward a few steps before the berry popped, resulting in another cheer from the berry horde, and another colorful belch from Alice. Her bulge was visible through her dress now, it puffed up to look like she was reaching the end of her first trimester. Alice was panicking now and dove for the hole, which her puffed up stomach just barely fit through. The berries pulled on the hem of her dress trying to pull her back in. Rolling over onto her back, she started kicking the belligerent berries frantically. She was about to slide out when two berries found their way through the brambles and jumped at Alice’s face. Not noticing at first Alice was shouting warnings at the berries on the other side, when the two jumped into her mouth. She heard them giggling as they moved toward their goal, and she scrambled to get out before they reached it.

She failed however, and there were two pops followed by excruciating pain. Alice belched a huge colorful cloud which turned into a agonized scream, as her belly outgrew the hole in the brambles. The thorny vines squeezed her like a vice, Alice new if she could get out, she was done for.
1432222122111.title: Alice and the Bloe Berries

14322221221111.content:
More berries started squeezing through the brambles, Alice knew she needed to escape. She pushed out her stomach as far as it would go, trying to force the hole bigger. The thorns poked her, piercing her skin, she feared that she would pop, finally when it was big enough, she sucked in her gut. She slipped out and crawled away from the hole, fleeing from the berries as fast as she could. She cradled her poor bruised and swollen tummy, and looked back to see the berries were not giving chase. “Get lost you ingrate.” One of the berries cried, as they returned to the woods.

Alice ran out into a vast field, she ran for quite a way, wanting to be certain no bloe berries were following her. When she was sure no one was around she sat down on the grass to rest. Alice looked down at herself, a large bulge sitting under her dress. She lifted up her torn dress to reveal her bloated stomach looking like she was well into her second trimester, if she were pregnant that is. There was a red mark where the brambles had pinched her, and numerous cuts from the poking thorns. “What did those nasty little berries do to me?” Alice whined reaching out to rub her stomach. She winced as it was very tender, from all the damage it had endured. “Oh dearie, that looks awful.” Alice froze looking all around for the source of the voice, but all she saw was large watermelons littered about the field. “Hello, who’s there?” Alice asked cautiously standing up, having learned her lesson about being suspicious. “Why, I right here dearie.” The giant watermelon that lie before her suddenly lurched, revealing it was another strange plant person, only this one resembled a heavily pregnant fat lady, which was three times her size.

Alice marveled at the immense beauty before her, feeling both enchanted and intimidated, she could easily pick up Alice as if she were an infant. “Hello I’m Alice” She croaked, not know what else to do, and too overwhelmed to do much else. “Hello dearie, I am Walla, pleased to meet you.” Alice just continued to stare, having trouble thinking with the immense woman before her. “What are you?” She asked, still taking in the watermelon woman’s form. “I’m a Wotermelen dearie, I just lay here all day and grow.” “That sounds like quite the life.” Alice said sincerely, not realizing how candidly honest she was being, about wanting a life like that. The Wotermelen woman smiled at her knowingly and replied. “Oh, it is, but what about you, dearie, does it hurt?” Walla asked, pointing at Alice’s belly. “Oh, yes, I barely escaped those horrible bloe berries, I might have popped.” Alice said looking at her stomach. “Oh, they are not so bad, quite tasty actually, here let me help you.” Walla said, as she hefted up her massive breast, milking out a pinkish gel from her nipples. “What is that stuff.” Alice said reeling back in disgust. “Just my gel.” Walla answered a little surprised at Alice’s reaction. “Come here dearie, this will help.” Walla said as she grabbed, Alice’s wrist and pulled her closer. Alice panicked afraid she had fallen into another trap. “Wait, please, I don’t want to be a blimp.” Her struggling was pointless as the massive Walla, easily outweighed her, Alice helpless to resist. Walla got her in range and started rubbing the glob of gel onto Alice’s battered belly.

Alice cried out in pleasure, as her cheeks grew red. Walla’s forceful but gentle touch, coupled with the cool gel, and her newly sensitive swollen stomach, combined to fill her with arousal. She could feel something happening her stomach tingling, every nerve on fire, she felt like something was growing. When Walla let her go, Alice stood there for a moment, overwhelmed by arousal, she slowly regained her composure and looked down, afraid at what she would find. Surprisingly to Alice, she wasn’t any bigger, her stomach however was perfectly pristine. The cuts and marks were healed, her stomach was free of all blemishes, her smooth pale skin, making her belly shine in the sun. “Oh my.” Alice said, in awe at how beautiful her belly looked. “See dearie nothing to worry about.” Walla said with a smile, rubbing Alice’s head, Alice blushed feeling ashamed for suspecting her. “Well, that takes care of my belly, but what about my dress.” Alice said holding up the hem of her dress, it was littered with rips and tear from the brambles. Walla contemplated her question for a moment, before looking off into the distance.

“There is a house near here, but I would advise against searching there, the owner is quite mad.”
“A little farther down the way there is a town, but the people there are a little bit odd.”

Alice was disappointed it sounded like there were weirdos all around, but which weirdos did she want to deal with. “Before you go, I’ll want to give you something for your journey, dearie.” Walla produced a large jar from somewhere, and filled it with more of her gel. “Take this, we wouldn’t want that beautiful belly of yours getting hurt.” Walla said with a wink, Alice hugged the massive green woman, and thanked her. “Thank you, Walla, I’ll never forget you.”

Alice returned to the road and looked at the path before her, the house Walla mention was closer, but might house trouble. “Now where should I go.”

143222212211112.content:
Alice headed down the road, until she neared the house. She looked at it, and looked at her torn ragged dress. “Am I really planning to go to some town and meet the people looking like this.” She moaned to herself, glancing at the curious house again.

Against her better judgement, Alice creeped up to the perimeter of the house, being very careful not to alert the person living inside. The Wotermelen woman warned her that the owner was crazy, and she wasn’t keen to find out in what way. The door wasn’t locked, which left Alice guessing, was the owner home or not. She snuck inside and looked around, the entryway was large with a stairway leading up to the second floor, there were rooms going along the sides. Alice quietly tiptoed up the stairs to the upper floor, she assumed the bedrooms would be found there and she was right. As she explored the house, she noticed something strange, in one room she noticed another mirror sitting in front of an opened door, she paid it no mind assuming it had something to do with the owner’s madness and continued looking for a bedroom.

She found one that appeared to belong to a girl her age, she went to the dresser and looked for some new clothes. She found a blue and white striped dress that was surprisingly big around the middle. Alice slipped it on and was delighted to find it was pleasantly roomie around her belly. “Who would’ve thought I’d actually find clothes in my size, and even with this unfortunate belly.” Alice said quietly to herself. “What’re you doing rifling through my stuff.” Alice tensed up and looked around, trying to find the source of the voice. Her attention turned to another mirror which was sitting in front of another opened door. She peered at it attentively until she noticed the rounded bellied girl in the “reflection” had red hair and pigtails, which she did not. “Who are you?” Alice asked astonished at the optical illusion before her. “I live here, you daft little thief.” The girl said, glaring at Alice. “Oh, right sorry, I’m Alice, I was wondering if it isn’t too much of a bother, could I borrow some of your clothes, mine got all torn up you see.” Alice nervously explained, she was surprised that the person she was warned about was a girl no bigger than she, well, not in height. The girls middle was a good bit bigger than hers, making the girl appear overdue with twins.

The girl just eyed her angrily, making Alice feel ashamed, when Alice noticed that the mirror was just a frame, which wasn’t too surprising. What was surprising was that the room behind the mirror was perfectly mirrored to the room she was in. “I’ll say, that is an impressive trick.” Alice said noting the optical illusion created by the mirror frame. The girl seemed to cheer up at the mention of the mirror trick, and got a proud smile. “I’ll say, I spent a whole day getting it perfect for when the mistress returned, and it works perfectly.” Alice just stared at the girl worryingly. “Mistress?” she asked, at which point a loud cry came from the entryway. “ELENORE!“ The girl’s expression became fearful, and she looked to Alice and whispered. “I’m sorry.” A large woman with a garish hairdo and even more garish looks, barged into the room, and glared at Alice. “Elenore there you are.” The woman barked, Alice just glanced back at the girl behind the mirror, and said. “I think she’s talking to you.” The girl just mimicked her actions maintaining the mirror charade. “Elenore pay attention to me when I’m speaking to you.” Alice was left utterly confused, at how this woman, couldn’t see through this act. “I am not Elenore, that is Elenore.” Alice explained pointing at the girl, who did the same. “Yes, and she is you.” The large woman said storming up to Alice and grabbing her by the arm, and dragging her toward the door.

“No wait, you’re making a mistake, that isn’t me, she is much more round than I am.” Alice exclaimed, the woman stopped and looked at the two. “The mirror always adds a few pounds, naughty girl.” This response left Alice stunned, surely it was some sort of jest. “She has different hair than me.” The woman looked again, uninterested and simply replied. “Obviously your trying new things, I much rather like your current choice it looks wonderful.” The woman said running her fingers through Alice hair. “Are you kidding me, why can’t I see you in the mirror.” Alice growled, getting sick of this foolishness. “I am not reflected because that is a good mirror, and it knows I don’t care to see myself, or be reminded of my age.” The woman growled, Alice was rendered speechless, the willful ignorance was dumbfounding, what sort of mad woman, was this person? “Now enough of this foolishness, you have been a naughty girl, shirking your chores and it is time for you to receive your punishment.” This really set Alice off and she started struggling fiercer, but it was no use. As Alice looked back, she saw the girl, this Elenore snickering to herself and waving goodbye.

The woman led Alice to the basement where strange equipment resided. The large woman, held Alice’s arms down and threw her onto a strange chair, like something from a hospital. The woman strapped Alice in, much to her horror, and went to search a nearby metal cabinet. “What is going on, what is this about?” Alice stammered, freaking out at the inappropriate position she found herself in. “You know what this is about, you have been slacking off for weeks now, darting away every time I spot you in the mirrors, but now it is time for your punishment, you naughty girl.” The woman explained as she found what she was looking for.

The woman pulled out a plastic tube attached to a bulbous rubber plug. “What is that for?” Alice cried in panic, the woman did not answer, she just looked under the table. Alice wondered what she was doing, until she noticed there was a hole in the strange bed she was strapped onto. Given where the hole was, Alice quickly realized what the woman was doing, and with a little pain, and a slight amount of pleasure, the plug was inserted.

Alice squirmed feeling the plug between her cheeks, it was humiliating and uncomfortable. Alice thought that was it, but she was unfortunately proven wrong quite quickly, as the woman took the other end of the tube and plug it into a canister filled with a strange liquid. “No please don’t, you don’t need to do this.” She pleaded getting really worried. “Nonsense, naughty girls must be punished.” The woman replied with a judgmental scowl as she turned the pin on the canister. She left Alice alone in the room, the liquid slowly travelling down the tube, she struggled futilely for only a moment, before she just accepted her fate. The liquid flowed beyond her view, the tube running under the chair. She waited anxiously for a few painstaking moments, until she felt a coldness invading her from behind. The liquid slowly drained second by second, minute by minute. Alice’s view became more obscured as her stomach encroached larger. The once roomy dress she was wearing got tighter and tighter. As the time passed the canister eventually drained, Alice was left feeling full and bloated, and after what seems like hours the woman finally returned to check on her.

She put her hand on Alice’s bloated belly and pushed hard, eliciting a groan from the girl, and when the woman stopped Alice’s stomach popped back, reacting exactly like a full water balloon. “Wonderful, now let’s get you unplugged.” The woman said, reaching down under the table. “No don’t, I can’t hold all this in.” Alice said her face flushing, at the oncoming humiliation. There was a loud “pop”
143222212211112.title: Elenore and her Mistress

1432222122111121.content:
Alice was shocked, because something absolutely unexpected happened, nothing. She squirmed about no longer feeling the plug, but still feeling frightfully bloated. “Why isn’t it coming out.” Alice moaned, knowing full well that the answer wouldn’t change what has happened. “Good, it has absorbed completely.” The woman exclaimed, giving Alice’s belly a rough shake, causing it to burble like a jug of water that had been shook. The woman released the straps that restrained Alice, and she quickly got down and groped her belly in a panic. “Absorbed, what do you mean absorbed, you don’t mean.” Alice inquired already knowing the answer. “Why are you acting so surprised, how exactly do you think your belly got so big, when you’re naughty, I shall make you bigger.” The woman said, it suddenly dawned on Alice, just how Elenore got such a large tummy.

Elenore’s mistress led Alice out of the basement, Alice was occupied fondling her self, she was so engrossed she didn’t notice the Mistress locking the front door. “Now Elenore, I am going to retire for the evening and I demand that this whole house be swept and dusted by the morning, I expect there will be no problems.” The woman explained, “Yes mam” Alice answered glumly.

After a while Alice was dutifully sweeping when Elenore visited her. “Having fun, you little dress snatcher.” She said with a gloating tone, Alice fumed at the girl’s comments. “Enjoy playing your stupid little game, when morning comes, I’m out of here.” The girl looked at Alice in disbelief. “You’re actually planning to go back out there you’ll be bigger than me in no time.” Elenore scoffed insultingly. “That might be but if I stay here, I know I’ll get bigger.” Alice countered poking Elenore in the belly, making her blush. “Why anyone would stay with that crazy woman is beyond me.” Alice exclaimed as she returned to sweeping. “I intend to return to my home.” Alice proclaimed her eyes showing her determination. Elenore returned her disdain and started forming a plot.

As morning dawned Alice was stirred from her slumber by a loud smash. “ELENORE!” she heard the woman holler in rage. “Get back here you naughty girl and take your punishment.” Elenore rushed into the room, Alice hopping out of bed in a panic. “What are you doing?” Alice cried, but Elenore just gave her a sadistic smile and rushed across the mirror frame. Before Alice could react, the mistress stormed in glaring at her. “What has gotten into you Elenore, must I punish you again so soon.” Alice backed away in fear. “No wait! Please it wasn’t me, I swear.” The mistress approached threateningly. “Now I shall none of your excuses.” She said flailing her arms about wildly.
